articles.author: Steve Holland, Heather Timmons
articles.title: McConnell lapse, Biden stumble highlight advanced age of US leaders - Reuters
articles.description: Senate Republican leader Mitch McConnell's unexplained freezeup while speaking in Congress this week is the latest reminder that America's most powerful political leaders are much older than many in other democracies.
articles.content: WASHINGTON, July 28 (Reuters) - Senate Republican leader Mitch McConnell's unexplained freezeup while speaking in Congress this week is the latest reminder that America's most powerful political lead… [+2563 chars]

articles.title: Blistering US heatwave spreads from south and scorches 190m Americans - The Guardian US
articles.description: Great Plains, midwest, mid-Atlantic and north-east hit by soaring temperatures, with New York City to reach 102F (39C)

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: CDC: Meat allergy caused by tick bite is on the rise - MLive.com
articles.description: Experts estimate that as many as 450,000 Americans may have developed the allergy.
articles.content: NEW YORK (AP) More than 100,000 people in the U.S. have become allergic to red meat since 2010 because of a weird syndrome triggered by tick bites, according to a government report released Thursday.… [+4244 chars]
